Record.ClassificationPath: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications/Pregnancy Complications/Pregnancy Complications, Hematologic
Hemic and Lymphatic Diseases/Hematologic Diseases/Pregnancy Complications, Hematologic
Record.BroaderTerm: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications
Record.Description: The co-occurrence of pregnancy and a blood disease (HEMATOLOGIC DISEASES) which involves BLOOD CELLS or COAGULATION FACTORS. The hematologic disease may precede or follow FERTILIZATION and it may or may not have a deleterious effect on the pregnant woman or FETUS.
